### Public Tender for Self-Contained Breathing Apparatus Maintenance

#### Tender Details

* Reference number: PW-__HN-329-81463
* Amendment number: 1
* Solicitation number: 21120-225814/B
* Publication date: 2022-11-25
* Tender closing date: 2022-12-19T14:00:00
* Amendment date: 2022-12-19
* Tender status: Expired

#### Tender Information

Tender Title
-------------

* English: Maintenance of self-contained breathing apparatus (SCBA) inventory
* French: Entretien de l'inventaire d'appareils respiratoires autonomes (ARA)

Description
-----------

Public Works and Government Services Canada invites tenders for the maintenance of the Correctional Service of Canada's (CSC) self-contained breathing apparatus (SCBA) inventory. The CSC requires the overhaul of its existing MSA Fire Hawk M7 SCBA units, which include MSA Ultra-Elite positive pressure face masks. Additionally, the CSC maintains an inventory of spare MSA Ultra-Elite positive pressure face masks with a 15-year overhaul requirement.

#### Tender Requirements

* Trade agreements: CETA/WTO-AGP/CPTPP/CFTA/FTAs with Peru/Colombia/Panama/Korea/UK
* Tendering procedures: All interested suppliers may submit a bid
* Competitive procurement strategy: Lowest/Lower Bid
* Comprehensive land claim agreement: No

#### Delivery Schedule

The tender closing date is 2022-12-19T14:00:00. The delivery date is specified in the request for proposal documentation.

#### Documents

The request for proposal documentation, including Annex C, can be found on the Canada Buys website. Suppliers may submit documents in either official language of Canada.
